pageDesc: This tennis tournament from the ATP 250 series was held in Belgrade, and our task was to manage social media during and after the tournament. Apart from that, we organized photoshoots and video shooting for promotional purposes.

section1.title: The Project That Left a Mark
section1.desc: We can openly say that Serbia Open has a special place in our portfolio. Not only because of the size and importance of this event for tennis and sports in general in this region, but because we met people of high quality and dedication, with whom we are still friends today.

section2.title: 1 Ticket 1 Tree
section2.desc: We had special success with the audience with the action "One Ticket - One Tree". The result is almost 40,000 trees planted all over Serbia. A perfect example of the importance of social networks in the communication of events to the audience, and added value through a socially responsible project.

metaDesc: A project we are proud of - The biggest tennis tournament and one of the biggest sports events in the region, the Serbia Open is growing every year. And we with him.
